impact-statement: Neurons of the cholinergic system, which release the excitatory neurotransmitter acetycholine throughout the cortex, also release the inhibitory transmitter GABA, with potential implications for cognitive function.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
